title: Luke and Technobabel
description: Luke and I discuss the possibility that technology is building a structure that is becoming a totalizing system and something that is, perhaps, too big not to fail. We also look at the role that hyper-rationality plays in system building that ultimately becomes constricting, killing innovation and destroying individual flourishing and connection to Truth.
